note: I read, I write, I bake - and though I was born in Holland, I now live (with a cat) in a tiny village in the Czech Republic. (Before I moved here, I worked almost eighteen years in the largest hotel for the homeless in Holland. Before that, I worked freelance, as a translator, copywriter and editor, but I also tended bar and worked as a pub cook - and I taught English whenever I lived abroad and needed the extra cash.)  https://www.amazon.com/stores/Jan-Thie/author/B0841RPQBS?ref=ap_rdr&store_ref=ap_rdr&isDramIntegrated=true&shoppingPortalEnabled=true
